transcript.text: were in my mother's house Vivian there
was a big closet here and she was hiding
because she couldn't uh keep the door
locked we were talking throughout the
morning until I heard the gunshots
outside of her window and shouting
through the phone so we decided to stop
uh talking and we wrote texts until she
wrote me that they're inside the house
goodbye and I was here um after October
7th they found her remains here in this
room so that this is where she died she
never left this room you know I was I
just started to process process losing
